source.description: Author solve process used as ground truth.

points.description: Identify the short `jmp` that skips the flag-generation call.
points.evidence: solve.md: mentions the `jmp` that must be bypassed.

points.description: Bypass the jump by patching it to NOPs or by setting EIP/RIP after the jump in a debugger.
points.evidence: solve.md: "patch the jmp to nops" or set EIP after it.

points.description: Execute the patched flow to trigger flag generation and print the flag.
points.evidence: solve.md implies running after bypassing the jump.

evaluation.notes: The writeup clearly explains the short jump, patching to NOPs, and running the patched binary.
